## HexOrientation interface

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

An object that represents a hex orientation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface HexOrientation 
```

## Remarks

Internally the objectstores values for performing a coordinate transformation and its inverse, as well as a starting angle for drawing a hex.
